title: BYOB
description: What zoo animals would make great wedding guests? Travis is condoning violence (11:15), while Christina made friends this weekend (18:25). Does Trevor Lawrence love football (37:45)? Champions League Coup (48:42). Aaron Rodgers is not the answer…maybe Joe Buck is (1:05:00). Katie recaps her Saturday night watching Jake Paul fight (1:25:26). Yankee fans aren’t happy (1:46:32). Mel Kiper Jr eats like a child (1:58:39). Zion likes MSG (2:01:14). Travis attempts to breakdown F1 (2:05:30). Finally, what is allowed in the shower (2:14:33)?
itunes:author: ESPN, Katie Nolan
itunes:subtitle: Katie and the Sports Union chat about Trevor Lawrence, ESL & more
